body.p:
State of Kentucky
Rockcastle County
To his Excellency Tho. E Bramlett Govr. of Kentucky

Your petitioner John Bucher would most respectfully represent to your honour -- That at Feby Term of the Rockcastle Circuit court for Fbey 1864 there were two Judgts, obtained aganst him, on the charge of gaming & the for retailing for $20. cash, I was absent at the of trial being at time engaged as Waggon Master at the time and was on my way to Cumberland-Gap,
I send this by our mutial friend Brooks and would be very much obliged to you, if you remit the fines aforesaid

I remain yours truly
John Bucher

Rockcastle Cir Ct
vs
John Butcher
$20. each
28th Feby/65
Remit
